title: [LOGLAB-22] Not all pendingDecreaseCollateral is utilized due to the max limit
summary: A bug has been reported in the BasisStrategy.sol file, specifically in the spotSellCallback() function on lines 601-607 and 752-758. The bug occurs when the strategy is partially deutilizing and the storage variable `pendingDecreaseCollateral` is added to `collateralDeltaToDecrease`. This causes an issue when `collateralDeltaAmount` exceeds a specific boundary `max` and is capped at that value. As a result, the remaining amount of `pendingDecreaseCollateral` is not utilized. The bug has been fixed by assigning `pendingDecreaseCollateral` with the value of `collateralDeltaAmount - max` when it is bigger than `max`. This bug has been marked as fixed.
